title: Dinosaur on the loose
description: A biggin' with a big scar on its left side
sighting: At the golf course, near the 18th hole, on 32nd & Hazletine

title: It broke my wine rack!!!
sighting: I awoke to a gator in my kitchen (Orange st & 96th) that was staggering drunk! It headed southeast about 10:00am this morning!! Look out!!!!!

title: 6 footer in my pool
description: gator was clearly blind with cataracts and missing its back right foot
sighting: The gator could not get out of pool -- we used a crunchwrap supreme from taco bell to lure 'im out. My cat has been missing ever since the sighting...
